global.browsehappy: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.

main.title: Welcome to Agate!
main.subtitle: Agate allows you to manage your own account and, for those with administrator rights, other users accounts, groups and integrated applications.

logged.userMessage: You are logged in as user "{{username}}".
logged.adminMessage: You are logged in as user "{{username}}" with administrator rights.

help.style: Override the default style with your own stylesheet.

error.authentication: Authentication failed! Please check your credentials and try again.

messages.error: An error has occured! Settings could not be saved.

firstname.minlength: Your first name is required to be at least 1 character
firstname.maxlength: Your first name cannot be longer than 50 characters

lastname.minlength: Your last name is required to be at least 1 character
lastname.maxlength: Your last name cannot be longer than 50 characters

email.minlength: Your e-mail is required to be at least 1 character
email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 50 characters

error.global: The password could not be changed.
error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

error.global: An error has occured! The password could not be changed.
error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 5 characters
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters

confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirm password is required to be at least 5 character
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirm password cannot be longer than 50 characters

forgot-login.title: Can't access your account?
forgot-login.success: Check your email to complete your login recovery.

messages.error: An error has occured! The session could not be invalidated.

errors.title: Error!
errors.403: You are not authorized to access the page.

config.title: Properties
config.name: Name
config.publicUrl-help: Public base URL of the server that will be used when sending notification emails.
config.longTimeout-help: Ticket expiration timeout in hours when "remember me" option is selected.
config.inactiveTimeout-help: User account expiration timeout in days.
config.joinWithUsername: Sign up form offers to choose the username
config.joinWithUsername-help: User name will be extracted from user email.
config.encryption-keys-help: HTTPS connection requires to have a private key and a public key (certificate) defined. A self-signed key-pair is available by default. You can provide your own.
config.user-attributes-help: User description fields can be extended with some declared attributes. Apply also to join requests.

style.title: Style
style.info: Override the default style with your own stylesheet.

applications-description: The applications can use the registry of the associated users (either direct association or through a group). They can also define some permissions that can be granted to other applications by the user (see OAuth2 documentation).

application.name: Name
application.key-help: Leave blank to not modify application's secret key.
application.redirectURI-help: Callback URL to the application's server, required in the OAuth context.

delete-dialog.title: Delete Application
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete application '{{arg0}}'?

scope-permission.help: Permissions allow to qualify the authorization access to the application that is granted in the OAuth context. Permissions are optional.
scope-permission.name: Name
scope-permission.name-help: Name of the permission, without spaces.
scope-permission.description-help: Short description of the requested permission that will be shown to the user.

groups-description: Users can be grouped and each group can be associated to one or more applications. Users from a group can sign in these associated applications.

delete-dialog.title: Delete Group
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete group '{{arg0}}'?

ticket.token-decoder-help: When a ticket is issued a token is sent to the client. This token is signed and contains information to track back the associated ticket.
ticket.authorization-help: Authorization constraint that applies to this ticket. If none is specified, all the applications that are accessible by the user can validate the ticket's token.

users-description: Users can sign in their associated applications (this association can be direct or through a group). A user can also authorize an application to access its data in another application (see OAuth2 documentation).

user.name: User Name
user.status-help: Only active users can sign in.
user.role-help: A simple user can only access to its own account.
user.groups-help: Members of a group get access to the applications associated to this group.
user.applications-help: Applications in which the user can sign in.
user.pending-requests-help: Some people have requested to join the user directory and are awaiting approval. You can approve or reject these requests.

delete-dialog.title: Delete User
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete user '{{arg0}}'?

delete-dialog.title: Delete Attribute
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete attribute '{{arg0}}'?

error.duplicated: The '{{arg0}}' attribute already exists or it is a configuration attribute.

profile.authorizations-help: Authorizations that you have granted to applications.

name: Name
fix-error: The form has some errors. Please fix them before submitting.

error.403: Server rejected your request, please make sure you are logged in and try again.

password.too-short: Password is shorter than the required {{arg0}} characters
password.not-changed: New password is identical to the current password

error.email-already-assigned: Email '{{arg0}}' is already assigned to another user.

oauth.title: Authorize Application
oauth.grant-request: would like permission to access your account.
oauth.unknown-client-application: Client application requesting authorization could not be identified.
oauth.unknown-resource-application: Resource application could not be identified.
oauth.unknown-resource-scope: Resource scope could not be identified.
oauth.openid-openid-description: Permission to get your basic identity information (username).
oauth.openid-email-description: Permission to get your email address.
oauth.openid-profile-description: Permission to get your profile information.
oauth.openid-phone-description: Permission to get your phone (not supported).
oauth.openid-address-description: Permission to get your address (not supported).
